content: this is a really cute and quick crochet stingray no sewing required you can make him with a curled or straight tail yarn used - james c brett flutterby chunky - small amount of medium weight pink yarn for cheeks items used - us g/4 25mm crochet hook - yarn needle - 9mm safety eyes - poly fill - stitch markers optional - pipe cleaner optional - for curled tail *please note that safety eyes are not recommended for children under the age of 3 years
